newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-MAZZONE RETURNS AS CAGLIARI COACH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-MAZZONE RETURNS AS CAGLIARI COACH.

text.p: Former Cagliari coach Carlo Mazzone returned to the Italian serie A club on Tuesday, replacing sacked Uruguayan Gregorio Perez.
Mazzone, dumped by Roma at the end of last season to make way for Argentine Carlos Bianchi, said he could hardly refuse the offer to return to Sardinia.

"I wanted to repay a debt from three years ago when president (Massimo) Cellino, despite the fact that I was under contract, allowed me to realise what was then my dream: to coach Roma, the club of my home city," he said.
"So when he called me to lend a hand I could not say no."
Cellino dismissed Perez after Cagliari lost 2-1 away to 10-man Lazio on Sunday. He was the first coach in serie A to lose his job in a season only six matches old.
